data.question: What is the chemical formula of potassium-doped p-terphenyl synthesized in the study?
What method was used for single crystal X-ray diffraction data collection?
data.answer: Agilent SuperNova diffractometer using mirror-monochromated Cu Kα or Mo Kα radiation

data.question: At what temperature does antiferromagnetic ordering occur in [K(222)][methyl-p-terphenyl]?
Is the magnetic susceptibility of [K(222)]2[p-terphenyl3] consistent with a Curie-Weiss law above 70 K?
What is the main purpose of using ESR measurements in the study?
data.answer: To determine the properties of the AFM state and explore weak spin anisotropies

data.question: Does the study provide evidence for superconductivity in K-doped p-terphenyl?
What computational method was employed for first-principles spin-polarized calculations?
data.answer: Numerical atomic orbitals DFT approach implemented in the SIESTA code

data.question: What was the effective magnetic moment per terphenyl at room temperature as inferred from ESR data?
How was the magnetic exchange coupling constants extracted from the calculations?
data.answer: From the calculated energies for different spin arrangements via a least-squares fit to the expressions obtained for a Heisenberg Hamiltonian

data.question: Was disorder in the crystal structure considered in the DFT calculations?
What was the role of chelating agents in the synthesis of phase-pure systems?
data.answer: Chelating agents selectively encapsulate K+ ions and thus prevent the alkali metal from forming strong ion−π interactions

data.question: Did the study find that the antiferromagnetic ordering persists in chemical cousins of [K(222)]2[p-terphenyl3]?
What was the main finding regarding the magnetic properties of [K(222)]2[p-terphenyl3]?
data.answer: An AFM phase sets in at 13 K

data.question: How was the spin susceptibility calibrated using ESR measurements?
data.answer: By calibrating the ESR signal intensity against another Curie spin system with a known amount of spins

data.question: Was the synthesis of methyl-p-terphenyl outlined in the supplementary information?
What was the yield of [K(222)]2[p-terphenyl3] from the synthesis?
Did the study use quantum Monte Carlo simulations for analyzing magnetic susceptibility?
What was the purpose of using high-frequency ESR measurements?
data.answer: To improve the g-factor resolution and increase the magnetic field strength by an order of magnitude

data.question: Was the antiferromagnetic insulator state suggested to potentially host high Tc superconductivity?
What was the main challenge in controlling the reactivity of alkali metals mentioned in the study?
data.answer: Inherently problematic nature of alkali metals contributes to the difficulty of obtaining phase-pure materials
